COURSES.title: Beautiful online courses you can build in moments
COURSES.body: Make a beautiful online course for your customers. Podia hosts your course. That means all the lessons, files, and videos you want handled for you.

review.quote: I’ve wanted to offer e-courses for a while but always felt overwhelmed with how to set it up. Podia has made it super easy.

DOWNLOADS.title: Ebooks, templates, and any file type you can think of
DOWNLOADS.body: Have an ebook to sell? Templates you love? Podia makes it easy to spin up a sales page and sell ebooks, templates, audio files, video files, spreadsheets, and any other file type.

review.quote: We didn’t have to stress about technical details or custom coding. Using Podia made selling our first eBook quick, efficient, and fun.

COACHING.title: One-on-one coaching and consultations, with billing managed for you
COACHING.body: Sometimes your students want one-on-one attention. Podia makes it easy for you to charge for coaching sessions and consultations.

review.quote: Podia just works. It’s easy to use and includes everything you need to sell digital products. I’ve tried all the alternatives, and Podia is hard to beat.
review.subtext: Shawn Leamon, Divorce and Your Money

WEBINARS.title: Webinars and workshops with registration and payment in one place
WEBINARS.body: How can you charge for your webinars and workshops? Do it from your Podia site. Set up a paid webinar product and your customers can register straight from your website.
